## Source: kam193 (60e475750b95349319dcce7f69afe6399fe78c271b772c001f7a01df5e1e7bba)
Typosquatting package with a Telegram-bot with RAT-like functionality. The code has been changed a bit compared to the previous incarnations, but keeps the same capabilities.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.


Campaign: 2025-10-speedd-testing-bot

 - Downloads and executes a remote malicious script.
